description.title: Developer
info: Was a member of the Core-Optimize-Analyze team which developed the Analytics and Reports of the Admin panel for Shopify Merchants
Areas of focus included: the Customer Cohort Report, and Merchant Benchmarks.
Contributed code to the Shopify/web, Shopify/shopify, Shopify/polaris, and Shopify/polaris-viz repositories
Technologies: React, Typescript, GraphQL, Sass, Ruby on Rails, Storybook.js, Polaris

description.title: Software Developer
info: Most recently the lead developer for the Chromecast Receiver for all Bell Media brands
Previous responsibilities included creating the web authentication for TSN & RDS direct to consumer (D2C), and maintaining the CraveTV property for web.
Technologies: JavaScript, AJAX, JSON, HTML, CSS, npm, node.js, JIRA, git, Charles Proxy, Akamai Identity Services (AIS), CSG Ascendon, JWT.

description.title: Full-Stack Developer
info: Supported CraveTV and web authentication.
Responsibilities included integration and deployment of builds / web components to various server environments, and assisting external development agencies integrate services and platforms.
Technologies: JavaScript, AJAX, JSON, HTML, CSS, node.js, JIRA, git, Charles Proxy.

description.title: Automation Engineer - In-Car Experience
info: Designed, implemented, and maintained an automated test system to validate daily iOS builds for CarPlay.
Designed, implemented, and maintained a system to manage software quality issue reports and alert all stakeholders in a daily email report.
Technologies: Python, Ruby, UIA2 (JavaScript), shell scripting, HTML, CSS.

description.title: Software QA Engineer - Accessories QA
info: Tested iPod / iPhone / iPad integration (wired and wireless) with car stereos.
Responsible for writing test plans, executing tests, regressing, isolating and reporting issues found during testing.

description.title: QA Analyst
info: Represented QA and testing in all aspects of the Agile Scrum development process including Sprint Planning and daily Scrum meetings.
Created and executed test plans and test cases (manual and automated) for user stories, including risk based regression testing.
Technologies: shell scripting, Jira, GreenHopper, Pivotal Tracker.

description.title: UBC Campus Ambassador
info: Acted as the liaison between the University of British Columbia and Research In Motion.
Responsible for assisting the Campus Recruitment team from RIM find and recruit potential candidates for their new graduate and co-op positions.
Aided candidates with their applications to RIM, prepare for their interviews, and their successful transition from UBC to RIM.

description.title: Co-op: Software Test Associate - New Product Testing
info: Executed testing of new software on both production and prototype BlackBerry Wireless Handhelds.
Responsible for performing various types of tests including integration, regression, performance and general smoke tests.
Position demonstrated my ability to be a flexible team player who excels in an environment that requires the ability to effectively prioritize and juggle multiple concurrent projects.
